Variable.Name: RUN
Variable.Comment: mode: TRUE=blinking / FALSE=reset the output to false

Variable.Comment: mode: TRUE=blinking / FALSE=reset the output to false

Variable.Name: Blinker
Variable.Comment: Generate a cyclic programmed time sequence of impulses

Variable.Name: OnT
Variable.Comment: Amount of time to keep the output true (seconds)

Variable.Name: OffT
Variable.Comment: Amount of time to keep the output false (seconds)

Variable.Comment: Команда на очистку переменных для отображения на масках
